PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-13041998-07-150,  ,  ,  IA&ND, 
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by TRANSGAS LIMITED and SASKATCHEWAN POWER CORPORATION of their statutory powers to expropriate land on SWEET GRASS INDIAN RESERVE NO. 113-G7, for the purposes of a natural gas pipeline and an electrical power transmission system, and (b) in lieu of expropriation, granting them easements for those purposes.
Attachments
